title: Gervonta Davis Stops Mario Barrios With Crazy Body Shot In Round 11 | SHOWTIME PPV
author: SHOWTIME Sports
description:
Four-time world champion Gervonta 'Tank' Davis made history winning a title in his 3rd weight class after stopping towering champion Mario Barrios in round 11. 

#SHOSports #ShowtimePPV #DavisBarrios #GervontaDavis
